page.title: 14Warslow Youth/Adult Centre
page.content: The Youth and Adult Centre is based in the Middle School buildings. Tennis is one activity which takes place in the school grounds on Tuesdays between 7.30p.m. and 9.45p.m. and on Sundays between 10.30a.m. and 12.30a.m. On Tuesdays badminton also takes place in the school hall from 7.30p.m. until 9.45p.m. A slimming club is also run at the same time. It costs 20p per session to play badminton or tennis, unless you are still at school, when you do not have to pay. All members sign an indemnity form before any activity. Other activities include an art/pottery class and a woodwork/metalwork class, both of which take place on Thursday evenings.
